page.title: 08Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: Both communities hold a Sports & Carnival in the summer & the Capel Seion area holds a country dance & barbecue evening. The pub in Pisgah holds various events during the summer to attract visitors & locals. Recent events include sheep shearing competitions, a microlite air race, helicopter trips, choirs and barbecues The pubs in Pisgah & Llanfihangel serve bar meals which brings visitors to the area & several houses nearby offer bed & breakfast. The Rheidol Valley railway just passes through the block. It is the only British Rail narrow gauge railway in the country.
